job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Frontend, Internationalization
job.description:
Squarespace is looking for experienced software engineers to join our Internationalization Platform engineering team. Internationalization Platform is the engineering owner for internationalization efforts across all Squarespace products and engineering teams. We manage the foundational building blocks that allow product engineers to create localized interfaces, and our ownership includes a suite of internal code-libraries, platform applications, and the development of user-facing features.
Responsibilities For Our Team Include
Our primary goal is to delight our international customers by empowering Product Engineering teams. As a Senior Software Engineer on a growing and business-critical team, you will work with engineering teammates and cross-functional partners to scope and implement improvements to our International platforms and products.
Implementing changes within codebases we didn't build and don't own, and leaving them better than we found them
Defining and advocating for internationalization best practices across the organization
Scoping future requirements for the internationalization platform and products in response to coworker and customer feedback and behavior
Our team works in JavaScript (vanilla, Node.js, Typescript, React), Java (Spring), Postgres and Kubernetes. You will report to the Engineering Manager of the team out of our NYC office.
All Squarespace employees are working remotely at this time. We are closely monitoring the status of COVID-19 as we continue our work to build a return-to-work plan that ensures a safe return to our offices and provides flexibility for our employees.
Responsibilities
Ship well tested, idiomatic code to production, across code libraries, application code and microservices
Set boundaries, priority and milestones around technical problems of wide scope
Actively participate in technical discussions and code review
Be comfortable ramping up on both legacy and modern technologies to accomplish outcomes
Mentor teammates and colleagues across a spectrum of seniority
Maintain a kind, collaborative, and psychologically safe working environment
Qualifications
5+ years industry experience shipping web applications across large codebases with many contributors
Strong programming and architecture fundamentals in JavaScript
Experience as a Product Engineer or writing developer tooling and libraries used by Product Engineering teams
International experience is not required but a plus
About Squarespace
Squarespace makes beautiful products to help people with creative ideas succeed. By blending elegant design and sophisticated engineering, we empower millions of people — from individuals and local artists to entrepreneurs shaping the world's most iconic businesses — to share their stories with the world. Squarespace's team of more than 1,200 is headquartered in downtown New York City, with offices in Dublin, Los Angeles and Portland. For more information, visit www.squarespace.com/about.
Benefits & Perks
Health insurance with 100% premium covered for you and your dependent children
Flexible vacation & paid time off
Up to 20 weeks of paid family leave
Equity plan for all employees
Retirement benefits with employer match
Fertility and adoption benefits
Free lunch and snacks at all offices
Education reimbursement
Dog-friendly workplace in New York office
Commuter benefit in the form of reduced tax (Ireland) and pretax (US)
Today, more than a million people around the globe use Squarespace to share different perspectives and experiences with the world. Not only do we embrace and celebrate the diversity of our customer base, but we also
